import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Form, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { formatDate } from '../utils/helpers' class QuestionPage extends Component { render () { const { question, user, authedUser } = this.props const { author, timestamp } = question const { name, avatarURL } = user return (

Would You Rather ?

{`${name} asks :`}
{formatDate(timestamp)}
) } } function mapStateToProps ({authedUser, users, questions}, { id }) { const question = questions[id] const user = users[question.author] return { question, user, authedUser, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(QuestionPage)
